existing_features.title: On the in-session meditation view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "active"), update the Volume and Time/Seek slider sections so their labels render at the top-left outside the slider container and use a larger font size (in pixels) than the current label styling.

On the in-session meditation view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "active"), update the container elements that hold the Volume and Time/Seek inputs to use Tailwind classes "px-6 py-5" and remove the "premed-slider-container" class from those containers.

Remove or retire the "premed-slider-container" styling so it is no longer used by the Volume/Time containers after the class removal, ensuring there are no remaining references for these two controls.

On the pre-meditation setup view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "setup"), move the meditation guide container (the guide/stepper content shown before starting a session) to be the last container in the page hierarchy (bottom of the setup page), below all other setup controls/sections.

new_feature_requests.summary: Meditation session: move volume and time input labels to top-left outside container and increase label font size
Meditation session: adjust padding for volume/time input containers to px-6 py-5 and remove premed-slider-container class
Pre-med page: move meditation guide container to the bottom (last in hierarchy)

projectName: Adjust in-session volume/time input labels & padding; move pre-meditation guide to page bottom
